name: Ghost Forest (Terra)
description:
Help Samantha escape the Ghost Forest!

Samantha is a young girl, who is trapped in the mystery forest full of danger. But can she survive all alone? Some friendly ghosts will help her!

Created on a GameJam Tashkent

Credits:

Art by Yuliya Shapiro

Programming by Sherzod Khalilov

BGM by Haunted Corpse

SFX by jacksonacademyashmor, Ali_686, LloydEvans0, michael_kur9, OwlStor, isteak
